rules_text:
Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control this turn, it fights target creature you don't control.
Coalesce {4}{G}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this for {4}{G}{G}{G} from your graveyard. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as an Eldrazi Horror creature. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
